div.p: Year 6 of Imperatores Caesares Marci Aurelii Iulii Philippi Carpici Maximi Germanici Maximi Pii Felices Augusti, Mesore. Transcribed and collated from a file of conjoined petitions submitted to the most splendid prefect and posted in the treasury building … enclosed … with the subscription under it, as follows: To Aurelius Appius Sabinus, prefect of Egypt, from … a petition to the office of the prefect …; it is (as follows) … Translation: N. Gonis, P.Harr. 3 258
